SEARCH
Package edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.controllers

Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.controllers.RoomController
public class RoomController extends Object
This class represents a handler between our UI layer and our application layer. Methods from this class are called from our UI layer. RoomController then determines which Service object in our application layer to continue operations with. The status of each operation is then returned to the UI layer.
Author:
Cole, Brendon, Icko

    • getRoomInfo

      public static Room getRoomInfo(Integer roomNumber)
      This function searches for a room in our database matching a given room number. If it exists, the room is returned. Otherwise null is returned.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - Room number of Room.
      Returns:
      Room if exists in database. null otherwise
      See Also:
      • RoomServices.getRoom(Integer)

    • modifyRoom

      public Boolean modifyRoom(Room updatedInfo)
      This function takes in a room object and updates our database with the new information.
      Parameters:
      updatedInfo - Room with updated information.
      Returns:
      true if room was modified successfully. false otherwise
      See Also:
      • RoomServices.modifyRoom(Room)

    • addRoom

      public Boolean addRoom(Room newRoom)
      This function takes in a room object and adds it to our database.
      Parameters:
      newRoom - Room to add.
      Returns:
      true if room was added successfully. false otherwise
      See Also:
      • RoomServices.addRoom(Room)

    • getAvailableRooms

      public static List<Room> getAvailableRooms(Date startDate, Date endDate)
      This function takes in a start and end date and returns a list of rooms that are available during that time interval.
      Parameters:
      startDate - Starting date of interval.
      endDate - End date of interval.
      Returns:
      List of available rooms between startDate and endDate
      See Also:
      • RoomServices.getAvailableRooms(Date, Date)
